definition: bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient/at sb's beck and call
to look down/to stoop
variant of 俯[fu3]
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
rubbing from incised inscription
invitation card/notice
fitting snugly/appropriate/suitable/variant of 貼|贴[tie1]/to paste/to obey
ear/handle (archaeology)/and that is all (Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: She wanted her boyfriend to lick her feet all the time.
sentences.chinese: 她想让她的男朋友总是对她俯首帖耳。

sentences.english: Now he kowtows to the country where mandatory abortion is required.
sentences.chinese: 现在他对一个要求强制流产的国家俯首帖耳。

sentences.english: A：I want to marry a man who will wait on me hand and foot.
sentences.chinese: 我想嫁给一个能对我俯首帖耳的男人。

sentences.english: You'd better manage to subjugate him.Otherwise it will be all over with you.
sentences.chinese: 你得设法让他俯首帖耳，否则的话你就完了。

sentences.english: Only the identity, is enough to make the gods at the foot of her at the .
sentences.chinese: 仅仅这个身份，就足以使众神在她的脚下俯首帖耳了。

definition: to follow obediently
to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
to bow before (idiom)/to capitulate
servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
submissive/docile/obedient
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
deferential/respectful
to submit cheerfully/to accept willingly (idiom)
to call to come and shout to go (idiom); to yell orders/always bossing people around
to hold sb in the same regard as one would a god (idiom)
to obey an order/to take orders/to accept a state of affairs
deeply grateful
to be a yes-man
to be completely convinced/to fully accept another person's views
to acknowledge allegiance to (some regime)/to serve
